projectGridLines.stationName: Scapia Technology Private Limited - Software Engineering
projectGridLines.title: Title: Software Engineering Intern (backend)
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Software Engineering Intern (backend)

Description: The Engineering Intern will work closely with our engineering team to assist in various

projects and initiatives aimed at advancing our technical capabilities. Under the guidance of experienced

engineers, the intern will gain hands-on experience in engineering principles, processes, and

technologies relevant to our industry.

Focus areas:

• Assist in the design, development, and testing of engineering systems, components, or

processes.

• Collaborate with team members to contribute to the creation of engineering solutions and

prototypes.

• Conduct research, gather data, and perform analysis to support engineering projects and

decision-making.

• Participate in design reviews, brainstorming sessions, and problem-solving discussions.

• Assist in the preparation of technical documentation, reports, and presentations.

• Learn and adhere to industry standards, regulatory requirements, and best practices.

• Utilize engineering software and tools effectively to support project objectives.

• Follow safety protocols, procedures, and guidelines to ensure a safe working environment.

• Other duties as assigned by the engineering team.

Skill sets: JAVA, Data Structures, C, C++

Traits expectation: Strong understanding of software architecture, design patterns, and best practices

for building scalable and maintainable systems.

Knowledge of cloud services (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud) is a plus.

Expected learning: Software development & coding

Specific courses required for project execution: C, C++, Java, Data Structures and Algorithms
